modules.description: Processes linguistic stems by applying a set of transformation rules to strings, reducing words to their root forms. It operates on UTF-8 encoded text and supports multiple language-specific rule sets. Used to normalize search queries and improve information retrieval accuracy in multilingual applications.

This module provides linguistic stemming operations that transform strings into root forms using systematic rule-based patterns, including vowel checks, length constraints, and suffix replacements. It works with strings and employs structured rule lists to normalize text, enabling accurate comparisons via functions like `stem_cmp` and `stem_gt`. Use cases include information retrieval, text normalization, and natural language processing tasks requiring root-based similarity checks.
